Package com.fluidops.ajax

A set of Ajax components which allows bringing backend driven UIs to the browser seamlessly.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FEventListener
    Defines an interface for handling client side JS events.
    FTreeRenderer
    different ways to display tree items depending on their status
    XMLBuilder.ElementVisitor
    Element visitor interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AjaxServlet
    The servlet that handles AJAX requests and sends DOM changes back to the client.
    ChartServlet  
    ExporterServlet
    Exports a component's data into a data-format, e.g.
    FClientUpdate
    represents a UI update sent from the backend to the frontend in response to an Ajax call
    FClientUpdateComparator
    Comparator sorting FClientUpdates.
    FComponentRegistry
    A registry for FComponents.
    FErrorUpdate
    represents a UI update sent from the backend to the frontend as a response in case of error
    FEvent
    UI event which occurred in the browser and which is sent via Ajax
    FSession
    This class represents a UI session with a client.
    RequestUtils
    Request Utils than can be used as markers for requests.
    XMLBuilder
    A simple XML builder.
    XMLBuilder.Attribute
    Represents an attribute.
    XMLBuilder.Element
    Represents an element.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FClientUpdate.Prio
    defines the order in which client updates are sorted and thus executed on the client.
    FEventType  
    FSession.PageCode  

Package com.fluidops.ajax Description

A set of Ajax components which allows bringing backend driven UIs to the browser seamlessly. For testing, start com.fluidops.ajax.Start and point the browser to http://localhost/ajax/ajax.htm
